title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 October 2016 - XWiki
content:
<daemoen> hmm, anyone else around atm ?  
03:12 <jonesmeier> has quit  
03:14 <jonesmeier> has joined #xwiki  
03:16 <daemoen> hrm... i wonder if this is a broken tomcat issue  
03:32 <daemoen> hrm...  
03:32 <daemoen> strange  
04:20 <daemoen> ok, so im looking at the tomcat guide and it says that we shouldnt use anything newer than 8.5.4...  or is that just awkwardly written and we shouldnt use anything older than 8.5.5 ?  
04:21 <daemoen> oops, nvm  
04:21 <daemoen> i misread the numbers to begin with  
04:38 \* daemoen facepalms  
04:39 <daemoen> wtcrazytrain do i have to do to get past that stupid %2F %2F bug  
04:40 <daemoen> between versions too old to handle some of the libs, and versions too new to handle redirects... wth  
04:49 <daemoen> have currently tried:  7.0.54, 8.0.33, 8.5.0, 8.5.4..  7.0.54 seems to have issues with jar annotations stuff, the other 3 are all doing that redirect bug thing :\  
04:49 <daemoen> anyone know / have a valid/working version of tomcat (preferably 8.x) that doesn't crash hard...  
05:45 <D-Spair> has quit  
05:45 <D-Spair> has joined #xwiki  
06:24 <D-Spair> has quit  
06:25 <D-Spair> has joined #xwiki  
07:19 <sdumitriu> has quit  
07:19 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
07:31 <daemoen> Lo sdumitriu  
07:42 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:10 <vmassol> has quit  
08:31 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:33 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
08:43 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:56 <vmassol> has quit  
09:04 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:13 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:18 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:07 <boubou> has quit  
10:08 <boubou> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:25 <tmortagne> has quit  
10:26 <martinus\_\_> Hi ! Is there a tip for the following use case : I'm editing a long document/section in wiki mode. When I hit preview then "back to edit", I'm redirected to the top of the doc/section and have to seek for the line I was editing. It there an extension to remember the edit line ?  
10:27 <vmassol> Hi martinus\_\_, not that I know of, would be nice to have this by default. IMO you should open a jira issue (I don't remember seeing one)  
10:27 <martinus\_\_> vmassol, great thanks  
10:33 <martinus\_\_> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13769 ;)  
10:33 <martinus\_\_> ok, the bot handles it  
10:39 <vmassol> thanks  
10:40 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:40 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:55 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
11:24 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:50 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
12:10 <daemoen> Morning folks  
12:15 <daemoen> Anyone know which versions of tomcat are supposed to be valid right now for the 8.x release of xwiki?  7.0.54, 8.0.33, 8.5.0, and 8.5.4 all had issues.  7.0.54 had the jar annotations storm, the 8.x versions all suffered the %2F bug thing.  But the tomcat page seems to indicate that 8.0.33 and 8.5.0 should have worked...  
12:29 <edvorg> has quit  
12:30 <daemoen> vmassol: ^^  
12:35 <ClemensR> daemoen: see note here: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationTomcat   8.0.33 should be working  
12:36 <vmassol> thanks ClemensR  
12:42 <daemoen> ClemensR: I know what it's supposed to do... Problem is what it isn't doing  
12:42 <ClemensR> so 8.0.33 is not working either ?  
12:43 <daemoen> I tried the 3 versions of tomcat 8x listed above, all 3 were doing the %2F thing  
12:43 <daemoen> Nope :(  
12:43 <ClemensR> and this is not a case of missing org.apache.tomcat.util.buf.UDecoder.ALLOW\_ENCODED\_SLASH  
12:44 <ClemensR> as explained here:  http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationTomcat#HAllowing222F22inpagenames   ?  
12:45 <daemoen> I'll test that in a moment  
12:46 <daemoen> If that is the issue, might edit the page to make that a non troubleshooting note and part off the install guide.  I don't recall ever having to change that before though  
12:56 <daemoen> hmmm... im confused...  isnt the encoded urls setting the URIEncoding="UTF-8" that was set on the port 8080 connector ?  
12:56 \* daemoen pokes xwikibot  
12:58 <daemoen> ok, apparently im an idiot =D....  i hadnt ported the server.xml conf changes to the 8.0.33 by mistake  
12:58 <daemoen> testing that part now  
13:07 <daemoen> ok, got it fixed;  had 2 issues (both my own fault obviously).  unthinkingly, had moved xwiki to the ROOT war, and hadnt updated the nginx redirect to serve out the root path, and then had missed the uri encoding in the connector  
13:07 <daemoen> its working now =D  
13:22 <ClemensR> ok, glad to hear it works now :)  
13:46 <Enygma`> has quit  
13:47 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki

17:12 <iskorptix> hey  
17:12 <iskorptix> is there a way to disable zip bomb detection in xwiki ?  
17:28 <ClemensR> ok, there is zip bomb detection? I never tried that ...  
17:32 <iskorptix> yeah and it is switched on by default ...  
17:50 <vmassol1> iskorptix: no idea what you mean by zip in xwiki, could you explain?  
17:52 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
17:53 <tmortagne> has quit  
17:58 <iskorptix> vmassol: nevermind..  
17:58 <iskorptix> is it possible to rename uploaded file ?  
18:02 <vmassol> iskorptix: nope  
18:02 <vmassol> no attachment rename ATM  
18:02 <vmassol> see http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-1657  
18:15 <ClemensR> just download, rename locally, upload ... which does not update references, admittedly  
18:17 <vmassol> has quit
